snippet.title: Soft Body | Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
You are a beautiful, gooey snake, and you paint the world with your soft body.  

www.softbodygame.com

Soft Body is an action-puzzle game set in a meditative, musical world. Inspired by the simplicity and joy of twin-stick shooters and other arcade games, players use both analog sticks to control two beautiful, gooey snakes at the same time. Soothing and tense, Soft Body infuses the twin-stick shooter with a surreal sense of control and style.

Coming to PS4, PS Vita, PC, and Mac in early 2016

www.facebook.com/softbodygame -- Like and follow on Facebook

www.twitter.com/softbodygame -- Follow on Twitter @softbodygame
